attributes.action: Introduce a revised form of compulsory national service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A proposal to introduce a National Service requiring all UK Citizen school leavers to serve 1 year in a role which gives something back to the community and the Country. Roles will include military, emergency sevrices, public services and voluntary organisations, therefore providing the widest possible breadth of opportunities.

Service would commence upon leaving full time eduction (either 16, 18 or post-university).

This is not about boosting the country's armed forces. This is about instilling in young people a sense of pride in this Country and giving them the practical skills to operate in society. Learning to deal with responsibility, to respect authority and to take pride in their work. Learning self-discipline, a trade, team work and respect for other people. 

Let's give young people a bit of a boost and the best start and help create a cohesive society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
